Business Tax Prep,Corporate Return,Final Tax Return

rules.description: Synchronizes all accounts with new SSO
rules.formula: OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Account_Status__c), ISCHANGED(Advisory_Status__c), ISCHANGED(Chargeback_Status__c), ISCHANGED(Finance_Status__c), ISCHANGED(BTP_Paid_2017__c), ISCHANGED(BTP_Refund_2017__c), ISCHANGED(Basic_Bookkeeping__c), ISCHANGED(Bookkeeping_Specialist__c), ISCHANGED(Business_Type__c), ISCHANGED(CP_Bookkeeping_Access__c), ISCHANGED(CP_Extended_Storage__c), ISCHANGED(Entity_Tax_Classification__c), ISCHANGED(Name), ISCHANGED(OwnerId), ISCHANGED(P2C_Customer_ID__c), ISCHANGED(Payroll_Manager__c), ISCHANGED(Previous_Owner__c), ISCHANGED(Primary_Contact__c), ISCHANGED(Schedule_E_2017__c), ISCHANGED(SmartVault_Folder__c), ISCHANGED(Tax_Extension_Business_2015__c), ISCHANGED(Tax_Extension_Business_2016__c), ISCHANGED(Tax_Extension_Business_2017__c), ISCHANGED(Tax_Extension_Business__c), ISCHANGED(Tax_Extension_Personal_2015__c), ISCHANGED(Tax_Extension_Personal_2016__c), ISCHANGED(Tax_Extension_Personal_2017__c), ISCHANGED(Tax_Extension_Personal__c), ISCHANGED(VTO_Business_2015__c), ISCHANGED(VTO_Business_2016__c), ISCHANGED(VTO_Business_2017__c), ISCHANGED(VTO_Business__c), ISCHANGED(VTO_Personal_2015__c), ISCHANGED(VTO_Personal_2016__c), ISCHANGED(VTO_Personal_2017__c), ISCHANGED(VTO_Personal__c), ISCHANGED(Lead_Type__c), ISCHANGED(Lead_Type_New__c), ISCHANGED(Lead_Source__c), ISCHANGED(Lead_Source_New__c), ISCHANGED(X2017_LZ_BTP_Purchased__c), ISCHANGED(X2018_LZ_BTP_Purchased__c), ISCHANGED(X2018_LZ_Equip_Est_Tax_Purchased__c), ISCHANGED(X2019_LZ_BTP_Purchased__c), ISCHANGED(X2020_LZ_BTP_Purchased__c), ISCHANGED(X2021_LZ_BTP_Purchased__c), ISCHANGED(X2022_BTP_Purchased__c), ISCHANGED(VIP__c), ISCHANGED(Embark_client__c), ISCHANGED(BillingCity), ISCHANGED(BillingCountry), ISCHANGED(BillingPostalCode), ISCHANGED(BillingState), ISCHANGED(BillingStreet), ISCHANGED(PortalAccountOwner__c), ISCHANGED(BK_Specialist__c), ISCHANGED(BK_Status__c), ISCHANGED(BK_Stage__c), ISCHANGED(EIDL_Status__c) )

criteriaItems.value: Bad Number,Dupe,Do Not Call,Not Interested in CAP

rules.description: Moves dead accounts to the dead queue

rules.formula:
AND( ISCHANGED( Account_Status__c), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Account_Status__c ) , "Dedicated" ), ISPICKVAL( ( Account_Status__c ) , "Cancelled" )
)

rules.description: WF used with eamil alert to send internal message to Accountant that they need to schedule an advisory.

rules.booleanFilter: 1 or 2 or 3 or 4 or 5 or 6 or 7 or 8 or 9 or 10 or 11 or 12 or 13 or 14 or 15 or 16 or 17 or 18 or 19 or 20 or 21 or 22 or 23 or 24 or 25
1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16
1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17 OR 18 OR 19
1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17 OR 18 OR 19
1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10

rules.formula:
AND( ISCHANGED( Account_Status__c), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Account_Status__c ) , "New" ), ISPICKVAL( ( Account_Status__c ) , "Cancelled" )
)

criteriaItems.value: Partner Page Referral,Live Plan Referral,Dissolution Referral,Partner Referral,Partner Page Referral – Taxes,Partner Page Referral – Bookkeeping

rules.formula:
AND( ISCHANGED( Account_Status__c), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Account_Status__c ) , "Onboarding" ), ISPICKVAL( ( Account_Status__c ) , "Cancelled" )
)

AND( ISCHANGED( Account_Status__c), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Account_Status__c ) , "Onboarding" ), ISPICKVAL( ( Account_Status__c ) , "Dedicated" )
)

AND( ISCHANGED( Account_Status__c), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Account_Status__c ) , "Payment Pending" ), ISPICKVAL( ( Account_Status__c ) , "Onboarding" )
)

rules.description: Workflow to change the Portal Account Owner Email field on the Account any time the Portal Account Owner value changes.

rules.formula:
AND( ISCHANGED( Account_Status__c), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Account_Status__c ) , "QBR" ), ISPICKVAL( ( Account_Status__c ) , "Cancelled" )
)

rules.description: Marketing campaign (2019) to sell retirement plans to existing clients.
When a Bark/Paid Media Account owner is updated from a queue to a user (Or from General Queue to user) the Date For Reassignment is updated to one business day later
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(OwnerId), OR( BEGINS(PRIORVALUE(OwnerId) , '00G'), PRIORVALUE(Owner_Name__c) = 'General Lead' ), BEGINS(OwnerId , '005'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Lead_Source__c, 'Bark'), ISPICKVAL(Lead_Source__c, 'MVF Global'), INCLUDES(Campaign__c, 'MVF Global'), INCLUDES(Lead_Type_New__c, 'Marketing') ) )

rules.fullName: Zero Corp Return %2F Final Tax Return
